attributes.review: I opened the app because I was interested in voting for trump, but all it had to offer was pictures of Cheetos all over it. This campaign must be a joke because this is absolutely immature to make a joke of an app as a way to campaign.
attributes.title: Cheetos everywhere

attributes.review: I personally think 🧚‍♀️💖💫that this app wasn’t very good I couldn’t find anything I tried sending a message 🌈🍄🧚‍♀️straight to our president but gosh darn I couldn’t figure out how💖🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️💖 terrible app wish if I could give it a lower rating😂🤮💖
attributes.title: This app was terrible

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app the lights started flickering and my sister started violently crying 😭 until she passed out... at least she looked peaceful😔 4 birds then dropped dead 🦜🦜at my newborn 👶 brothers feet, leaving him in shock, causing my dad to leave 👋. Then I punched my mom but that was unrelated
attributes.title: Haunted👀🤚💥

attributes.review: I downloaded it cause I saw a friends using it and I said that’s a “cool” app. So I checked and I put don’t allow on notifications and it sends me one like 5 minutes later!!!😡😡 I wouldn’t not recommend on downloading this app!!!
attributes.title: Annoying app

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it started infecting all the hats in my house to be raging fascists and now they are trying to take over the world. They see trump as a threat because they want to be the only fascist in the country. If i undownload this app i might appease my new gods...
attributes.title: Evil hat mob

attributes.review: this app took 3 weeks to download and took up ALL OF MY PHONES STORAGE. it gave my phone a virus and my whole phone went orange for a day like that cheeto puff in office 🥰🧚🏽💖😋🧚🏽. take this app down it is a disgrace to society and apple needs to do something about it. NOW.
attributes.title: absolutely terrible 🤢

attributes.review: This app is bad because it took a long time to load. It took me about 1 day to load and when it did load it crashed my whole phone and it took a long time to download like 3 hours.
attributes.title: This is bad

attributes.review: This app took forever to open my first time opening it and it randomly closes whenever I use it.... I also give it a 1-star review because Trump is lame and shouldn’t be president for a second term.
attributes.title: Glitchy and Slow

attributes.review: That’s the frick dude I downloaded this app for like 5 minutes and my whole plone just BOOM. Goes bye bye. This app won’t stop glitching and is seriously messing up my family’s lives. My grandma LOVED Donald trump but now she’s DEAD because of this app. This made my so upset 😡✨
attributes.title: My phone was murdered 😡✨

attributes.review: This app is possibly the worst app you ever get this made my dog in my mom die like what kind of person does that see do not get this app I’m very upset because when my dog died he died in a blender and my mom died in a toaster😡😡 I’m highly upset with this app✨😡🟠
attributes.title: Made my dog and my mom die✨💔😡😡😡😡😡🟠🟠
